title: Chartered Institute of Marketing to host Paa Kwesi Nduom
text:
7 October 2015 17:00 CET Chartered Institute of Marketing to host Paa Kwesi Nduom By GNA 
Accra, Oct. 7, GNA - One of Ghana's most successful entrepreneurs, Dr Papa Kwesi Nduom, would speak at the Continuing Professional Development (CPD) event and Eminent Speakers' Forum of The Chartered Institute of Marketing (CIM) in Accra. 
A statement issued by CIM in Accra and copied to Ghana News Agency said the event which is slated for Thursday, October 22 at 6:00 pm at the GNAT Hall is expected to attract largely members of the CIM fraternity, practicing marketers, industry captains, faculty and students of various tertiary institutions throughout the country and the public. 
CIM's monthly CPD's is essentially designed to keep professionals, marketing practitioners and business students abreast of various developments in the business world in order to enhance their professional development. 
CPD is the pathway towards Chartered Marketer status. 
The CIM is the world's leading professional marketing body that exists to develop the marketing profession, maintain professional standards and improve the skills of marketing practitioners. 
These enable the professionals to deliver exceptional results for their organisations. 
CIM is the only organisation able to award Chartered Marketer status. 
The event would be chaired by Reverend Professor E.K. Larbi, the Founder and President of Regent University College of Science and Technology. 
The other high profile personalities featuring as Special Guests of honour are Mr Ken Ofori Ata, Prof Samuel K. Bonsu, the Dean Business School, GIMPA and Mr James Asare-Adjei, President Association of Ghana Industries.
